title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Experiential Learning for Online Journalism Practical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational journalism theory and writing proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Produce three or more multimedia news articles using digital storytelling techniques required in real newsroom environments.
Revise articles incorporating five or more feedback sessions with peer learners and field experts using online collaboration tools.
Create and present two or more data visualization reports using data journalism tools (Tableau, Flourish, etc.).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
